lead_paragraph: The right hind bones that Barbaro shattered in the Preakness Stakes have healed well enough that he could have been out of his cast if not for the laminitis in his left hind hoof. Dr. Dean Richardson said yesterday the laminitis, a painful hoof disease, is preventing the removal of the cast.
